complaint.description: I have had the worst experience with vodacom in trying to block my number as my phone got stolen. This is my 2nd time and like the 1st time I can not find anything online regarding how to report my number. I am given a robot to talk to and NO ASSISTANCE... the last time my money got stolen because I could not get my number blocked.
complaint.suggestion: Please Vodacom, provide better customer service and assistance in blocking stolen numbers.

meta.review_content:
